body.name: NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream with Vitamin E and Hemp Seed Oil, 3 Pack of 6.8 Fl Oz Pump Bottles
features: Fights Shaving Irritation: This liquid shaving cream for sensitive skin helps protect from shaving irritations for visibly healthy-looking skin
Effortless Razor Glide: Enriched with Vitamin E and Hemp Seed Oil and softens hair for an effortless razor glide and a precision shave
Vegan Formula: Liquid sensitive skin shaving cream with a vegan formula and enriched with plant-derived ingredients
Recycled Pump Bottle: The convenient pump bottle is made of 97% recycled material, excluding the pump and label
Includes three (3) 6.8 fluid ounce pump bottle of NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream
body.description: Care for your skin and the planet with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream. This liquid shaving cream is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin, to soothe skin and help protect against shaving irritation. NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream is enriched with Vitamin E and Hemp Seed Oil to care for your skin while you shave. Great as an alternative to shave gel, this liquid sensitive shaving cream for men is fast absorbing, non-sticky, non-greasy and beard friendly. Enriched with plant-derived ingredients, NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream has a vegan formula and softens hair for an effortless razor glide and a comfortable, precision shave. The convenient pump bottle is made of 97% recycled material, excluding the pump and label. This men's shaving cream is dermatologically tested for sensitive skin. A sensitive shaving gel is a key part of a skin care routine and this product pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Moisturizer. To use, pump onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

Can you use this shaving cream on beards? Yes, this NIVEA liquid shaving cream is beard-friendly. Does this shaving cream lather up easily? Yes, NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream lathers up easily by rubbing with a brush or by rubbing directly onto skin with water. What ingredients are in this shaving cream? You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA MEN Sensitive Calm Liquid Shaving Cream on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite
reviews.reviewText: This stuff has become my new favorite shaving cream. I have been experimenting with all the different options and have finally settled on this. I have a terribly sensitive face and sometimes get irritation with shaving cream before a razor ever touches my face. This gel is quite soothing and provides a silky smooth glide. I use a small amount in a cup and whip it up into a rich lather with a badger brush. It takes a little experimentation to figure out the right amount to use. If you use too much it will be a bit slimy and clog your razor and if you don't use enough it will be too thin. Once you find the sweet spot, you will have a very enjoyable shave. Pleasant scent and not overpowering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My brother’s favorite
reviews.reviewText: I got this three pack for my brother for a birthday gift. It’s his favourite shave cream, he really likes the texture and consistency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the purchase.
reviews.reviewText: The closest shave I can remember! I’ve been shaving for about 50 years and this lotion, totally lubricates the whiskers, and allows the razor to wipe them off effortlessly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NIVEA MENS shaving can't be beat!
reviews.reviewText: I am 70+ years old and must admit to using many brands/kinds of shaving cream in my lifetime. Please know that NIVA MEN Sensitive CalmLiquid Shaving Cream is the absolute best. Additionally, you will same money using this product. It lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great feel and smooth shave for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I started buying this for myself bevmcause I have sensitive skin. My husband forgot to bring his shave cream on a vaca we took so he used my nivea. He liked it so well, I've started a subscription. Even though it's a man product, the scent is not overly manly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shaving Cream out There
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to switch from the regular shaving cream. I feel I get a much smoother shave. A little goes a long way. The price is great!
